channel.title: Penny Arcade: Downloadable Content (home-grown)
channel.itunes:author: Penny Arcade
channel.itunes:subtitle: Downloadable Content
channel.itunes:summary:
After a three year hiatus, Penny Arcade’s DLC Podcast was brought back to life when over 5,000 fans supported our Summer Kickstarter Project. Part of our campaign promise was to allow those that couldn’t support us at the time a way to "pay what you want" two weeks after the episodes aired to Kickstarter backers.
Now, if "what you want" is nothing, not a problem! There’s a link to the right of the Pay What You Want Button where you can download the episode for free.
This is also our test for using the Tinypass service, so please drop us a note to let us know how that experience is.
Thank you again for supporting Penny Arcade, and enjoy the second season to DLC!
channel.description:
After a three year hiatus, Penny Arcade’s DLC Podcast was brought back to life when over 5,000 fans supported our Summer Kickstarter Project. Part of our campaign promise was to allow those that couldn’t support us at the time a way to "pay what you want" two weeks after the episodes aired to Kickstarter backers.
Now, if "what you want" is nothing, not a problem! There’s a link to the right of the Pay What You Want Button where you can download the episode for free.
This is also our test for using the Tinypass service, so please drop us a note to let us know how that experience is.
Thank you again for supporting Penny Arcade, and enjoy the second season to DLC!
